verses.verse: When the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has cut off <WH3772> the nations <WH1471>, whose land <WH776> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you <WH3423>, and you succeed them <WH3427>, and live in their cities <WH5892>, and in their houses <WH1004>;

You shall prepare <WH3559> you a way <WH1870>, and divide the coasts <WH1366> of your land <WH776>, which the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives you to inherit <WH5157>, into three parts <WH8027>, that every slayer <WH7523> may flee there <WH5127>.

Why I command <WH6680> you <WH559>, saying, You shall separate <WH914> three <WH7969> cities for you <WH5892>.

And those which remain <WH7604> shall hear <WH8085>, and fear <WH3372>, and shall henceforth <WH3254> commit <WH6213> no more any <WH1697> such evil <WH7451> among you <WH7130>.
